description: This dashboard provides a default set of monitors to display key metrics for your server instance. To edit this dashboard, please refer to the [documentation](https://github.com/circleci-public/circleci-server-monitoring-reference?tab=readme-ov-file#8-modifying-or-adding-grafana-dashboards).

targets.expr: sort_desc(topk(10, sum by(route, method) (circle_http_request_count{api_version="v2", status_class="5xx"}))) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(route) (circle_http_request_count{route=~"/api/v2/insights/.*", status_class="5xx", deploy_environment=~"(production|canary)"}) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(status, type) (grpc_response_count{service="webhook-service", status!="ok"}) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(action) (rate(circle_permissions_service_client_call_count{status!~"(200|202|400|401|403)"}[$__rate_interval])) OR on(action) vector(0) / sum by(action) (rate(circle_permissions_service_client_call_count{status!~"(400|401|403)"}[$__rate_interval])) OR on(action) vector(0)

panels.title: Permission client calls error rate % by action excluding 4xx

targets.expr: sum by(route, method, status) (avg_over_time(circle_permissions_service_request_count{status!~"2.*"}[$__interval])) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(method, route, status) (circle_permissions_service_request_count{status!~"(200|202|201)"}) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(provider_name, endpoint) (circle_domain_service_providers_rate_limit{provider_name="github"}) / sum by(provider_name, endpoint) (circle_domain_service_provider_request_count{provider_name="github"}) OR on() vector(0)
avg by(http_route, http_method) (circleci_runner_admin_handler_count{http_status_code="500"}) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Runner API - 500 HTTP Responses (Internal Server Errors)

targets.expr: sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_distributor_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="external", http_status_code=~"5.*"}) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_distributor_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="internal", http_status_code=~"5.*"}) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_machine_provisioner_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="externalapi", http_status_code!~"2.*", http_method!="OPTIONS"}) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Machine Provisioner External API Request Errors

targets.expr: sum by(http_route, http_status_code, http_method, version) (circleci_output_handler_count{mode="receiver", http_status_code!~"2.*"})
sum by(http_route, http_status_code, http_method, version) (circleci_output_handler_count{mode="internal", http_status_code!~"2.*"}) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(http_route, http_status_code, http_method, version) (circleci_output_handler_count{mode="public", http_route!="/ready", http_status_code!~"2.*", http_status_code!="307"}) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_step_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="receiver", http_status_code=~"5.*"}) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_step_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="receiver", http_status_code=~"4.*"}) OR vector(0)
sum by(http_route, http_method, http_status_code, version) (circleci_step_handler_count{http_server_name!="admin", mode="internal", http_status_code=~"5.*", http_method!="options"}) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Average Task Wait Time by Resource Class (ms)
Mean Task Wait Time by Executor (ms)

title: Server SLIs Dev Copy Jacob
